conv.text: Hello Ava, I'm Albert Einstein. I'm trying to convince Moses to become an atheist, but I'm not having much luck. Would you be willing to help me out?

answers.option: Yes, I'd be happy to help

conv.text: Excellent! Let's go talk to Moses then. Follow me!
That's too bad. I was hoping you could help me out. Goodbye!
Hello Moses, this is Ava. We were hoping you would be willing to listen to our argument for atheism.
Great! Let's begin then. I'll start by explaining my theories and beliefs.
